channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dayforce’s stock wasn’t getting enough love, so Thoma Bravo stepped in with $12 billion
item.description: The $12 billion take-private deal of the human-resources software company comes after the stock had already lost more than a quarter of its value this...

item.title: Home sellers get a reality check even as sales pace inches up
item.description: The housing market improved slightly in July, as sales of existing homes rose.

item.title: The good news is we got an $800K windfall. The bad news is it came after a layoff. What do we do with it?
item.description: This couple, still in their 50s, are thinking about a vacation home and investing.

item.title: Here’s how much you’d pay to get Social Security’s inflation protection on your own
item.description: Social Security beats anything insurance companies offer.

item.title: Enterprise Claude gets admin, compliance tools—just not unlimited usage
item.description: Anthropic upgraded its Claude Enterprise and Team subscription to offer seats with access to Claude Code and offer additional admin controls.

item.title: TikTok parent company ByteDance releases new open source Seed-OSS-36B model with 512K token context
item.description: One of the defining features is its native long-context capability, with a maximum length of 512,000 tokens, 2X OpenAI's GPT-5 family.

item.title: Stop benchmarking in the lab: Inclusion Arena shows how LLMs perform in production

item.title: Forging connections in space with cellular technology
LLMs generate ‘fluent nonsense’ when reasoning outside their training zone
item.description: Chain-of-Thought isn't a plug-and-play solution. For developers, this research offers a blueprint for LLM testing and strategic fine-tuning.
